channel.description: Recent content in cover-to-cover on Bitperi(Periklis Gkolias)

item.title: I just finished Code complete cover to cover. Here are the most unexpected things I learned
item.description: I got code complete several years ago. Actually, it was a graduation gift. I sometimes peaked into some of its chapters but never thought I was able to read it all at once. It was like a superhuman task for me. Until this year, where I decided, in the game of no excuses, to play hard. One of the battles I chose to give was to finish the book. During this time, I learned a lot of stuff.
